title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Russell Westbrook's exit interview after a disappointing Lakers season and why it's obvious he still hasn't taken accountability for his role in missing the playoffs. He explains why he's rooting for this team in the NBA playoffs despite them being considered the villains of the league right now. He also points out more evidence he was always right about Tom Brady and Bruce Arians butting heads in Tampa Bay. Plus, 3-time NBA champion B.J. Armstrong joins the show to tell Colin why his NBA dark horse pick is outrageous. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
